meanings.sent1: Tommy is such a butthead when he forgets his homework.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a butthead and listen to your teacher.
meanings.sent3: The butthead in the class always makes silly mistakes.
meanings.sent4: His actions proved him to be a butthead beyond doubt.
meanings.sent5: Being a butthead won't get you far in life.

meanings.definition: A person who is annoying or difficult to deal with.
meanings.sent1: My brother can be a real butthead when he won't share his toys.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with a butthead like him is exhausting.
meanings.sent3: The butthead at work always interrupts during meetings.
meanings.sent4: She's a butthead, always causing trouble wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: Avoiding that butthead is the key to a peaceful day.
